name: Hot Dam
description:
This was made in Global Game Jam.

When a beaver must make a living by farming mushrooms to afford wood for his dams, grow mushrooms, harvest and sell them for building materials to build your dams.

How To Play

WSAD: Movement

E: Plant, Harvest, and Sell Mushrooms, Build Dams

Credits: 

Alex De Nardi - Artist

Ben Babicka - Designer

Justin Etchell - Programmer

MUSIC
